definition: to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: But this is a minor quibble.
When Alan was caught cheating, he tried to bluster it out but he couldn't deceive us.
sentences.chinese: 艾倫作弊被抓住後百般狡賴，不過他無法騙過我們。
